name: MDLObjectContainerComponent
desc: The general interface for classes that can act as containers in an object hierarchy.

items.name: var objects: [MDLObject]
items.desc: This object’s array of child objects.

items.name: func add(MDLObject)
items.desc: Adds the specified object as a child of this object.

items.name: func remove(MDLObject)
items.desc: Removes the specified object from this object’s array of children.
